channel.description:

view from left of character

basically if you look at the object from one side of the character its invisible and the other side its fine.
happens with other items aswell i have no idea wtf is causing it and i really do need it fixing lol. anyone know anything about fixing this?

item.title: [pi] semi invisible item wearing
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Set the priorities to 10 in datmaker.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] semi invisible item wearing
item.dc:creator: @ImNoHacker ImNoHacker
item.description:
@ImNoHacker wrote:

Simple. Since i have experience making customs this is a biatch when approached.

The problem is simple. The person who made it only used 1 layer. So when u turn it it becomes invisible to the eye. The fix is simply making it thicker. But for someone without customs experience, thats a def biatch

Also this problem is extremely common. No one will complain as it is in almost every rsps out there.

Read full topic
